pr_title: [FLINK-18055] [sql-client] Fix catalog/database does not exist in sql client

timeline.message: [FLINK-18055] [sql-client] Fix catalog/database does not exist in sql client
[FLINK-18055] [sql-client] Fix catalog/database does not exist in sql client

timeline.body: we can use try(resources) to avoid call finally here?
timeline.bodyText: we can use try(resources) to avoid call finally here?
timeline.bodyHTML: we can use try(resources) to avoid call finally here?
timeline.author: leonardBang

replies.bodyText: CliClient does not inherit from AutoCloseable, so we can put CliClient into try-with-resource block
replies.author: godfreyhe

timeline.body: Could we extract this code to a function for reuse purpose?
timeline.bodyText: Could we extract this code to a function for reuse purpose?
timeline.bodyHTML: Could we extract this code to a function for reuse purpose?
timeline.author: leonardBang

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
operands = new String[] { ((UseCatalogOperation) operation).getCatalogName() };
operands = new String[]{StringUtils.strip(((UseCatalogOperation) operation).getCatalogName(), "`")};
timeline.author: jxeditor

replies.bodyText: The quoting string ("`")  is skipped by sql parser, so we need not to handle this. see the test (TestItem.validSql("use `default`;", SqlCommand.USE, "default")) in SqlCommandParserTest#testCommands
replies.author: godfreyhe

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
operands = new String[] { ((UseDatabaseOperation) operation).getDatabaseName() };
operands = new String[]{String.format("%s.%s", StringUtils.strip(op.getCatalogName(), "`"), StringUtils.strip(op.getDatabaseName(), "`"))};
timeline.author: jxeditor

replies.bodyText: catalog name is unnecessary, only database is needed.
replies.author: godfreyhe
